column1: Cyber Security and Digital Forensics (with Placement) MSc
column5: This course is specifically aimed at International students, supporting those wishing to gain practical work based experiential learning. Together with studying your chosen course we are offering you the opportunity to secure a placement for an additional 6 months, making the course 18 months in length. This allows students with limited experience to put into practice the skills and techniques developed throughout the Master’s
column7: International fees : Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
